title: Interrelationships Between Corals and Fisheries
abstract: Introduction: The Need to Discern the Relationships between Corals and Fisheries Stephen A. Bortone Addressing the Global Decline in Coral Reefs and Forthcoming Impacts on Fishery Yields Peter F. Sale and Mark A. Sammarco A Strategic Approach to Address Fisheries Impacts to Deep-Sea Coral Ecosystems Thomas F. Ogden, Ivan Nagelkerken, and Carole C. McIvor Sustaining the Interrelationships between Corals and Fisheries: Managing for the Future Stephen A. Bortone
